title: Fatigue Risk Management Offshore
content: Fatigue Risk Management Plans (FRMP) identify fatigue hazards and implement controls. Offshore FRMPs should address tour length, shift patterns, workload, overtime, and rest quality. Monitor fatigue indicators: near-misses, errors, and self-reporting. Offshore fatigue is chronic and cumulativeâ€”rest days ashore are essential for recovery.

How does your organization monitor and respond to fatigue indicators?
